channel.title: I'm now on Spotify!
channel.description:
I've uploaded:
Albums:
Origin (2020)
Progression (2021)
As well as my 2022 releases that will eventually be an album itself.
Some of the art on Spotify is still placeholder until I can get someone to make proper album art. Have a listen! https://open.spotify.com/artist/65IdVb36nNVwTgqKx7B21U?si=iwCUv0u7RzWrbAOb317nqw

item.title: I'm now on Spotify!
item.dc:creator: Octave
item.description:
I’m using DistroKid to distribute my music and it seems they handle that side of things if I want to update anything. But will definitely keep this in mind to be sure!

Read full topic

item.title: I'm now on Spotify!
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Congrats on getting stuff out properly. It’s a good feeling.

Octave:

Some of the art on Spotify is still placeholder until I can get someone to make proper album art.

When you remove/re upload/republish those tracks (to replace artwork), be sure use the same ISRC number used for the original upload.

This should mean you keep any previous play counts.

Read full topic
